Control Name: 1.1.7 The right operational capabilities are used for Azure services.
Control Statement: Operational capabilities, such as auto-scale and auto-heal for App Services, can reduce management overheads, support operational effectiveness and reduce cost. Make sure you understand the operational features/capabilities available and how they can be used in the solution.
